description: This file defines a UI component named 'Details' using LightningJS framework. It manages the display of recipe details and loading state, fetching data asynchronously based on provided 'id' prop.

classes.name: Details
classes.description: A Lightning component that displays detailed information about a recipe, including handling loading state and navigation.

methods.name: backToHome
methods.description: Navigates back to the previous page using the router.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that fetches recipe data asynchronously when the component is ready.
